pet.name: Catnipporium
pet.information: Each montly box contains 5 cat pillows, all with different patterns matched for the month, a single BIG kicker, plus a secret treat or toy for your special furry friend! Every pillow is stuffed with super fresh all natral catnip! A monthly subscription is $18 a month.  A three-month pre-paid subscription is $15 a month, totaling $45, four times a year.  For more information, go to www.catnipporium.com.
pet.paragraph1: Each montly box contains 5 cat pillows, all with different patterns matched for the month, a single BIG kicker, plus a secret treat or toy for your special furry friend! Every pillow is stuffed with super fresh all natral catnip!

box of the week.name: FabFitFun
box of the week.information: Once a season, FabFitFun delivers the best in women's lifestyle products.  Subscribers will receive 8 to 10 full-sized beauty products, wellness items, fitness gear, and home goods.  Customize your quarterly box with add-ons and preferred products, or let it be a surprise.  A quarterly subscription is $49.99 a season.  An annual subscription is $179.99.  For more information, go to www.fabfitfun.com.
box of the week.paragraph1: Once a season, FabFitFun delivers the best in women's lifestyle products.  Subscribers will receive 8 to 10 full-sized beauty products, wellness items, fitness gear, and home goods.  Customize your quarterly box with add-ons and preferred products, or let it be a surprise.

male-baby.name: Reading Bug Box
male-baby.information: Perfectly personalized to every child's age, interests and reading level by the expert staff of our independent Children's Bookstore.  A monthly subscription is $19.99 a month.  A three-month pre-paid subscription is $19.50 a month, totaling $58.50, four times a year.  A six-month pre-paid subscription is $19 a month, totaling $114, twice a year.  An annual subscription is $18 a month, totaling $216, once a year.  For more information, go to www.readingbugbox.

male-child.name: The Ninja Squad Box
male-child.information: The Ninja Squad Box combines playground physicality, creativity, and problem-solving skills.  Each box has a new theme with awesome crafts, fun physical challenges, a character chart, and a full online interactive NINJA CLASS to do in the safety of your own home.  A monthly subscription is $33 a month.  For more information, go to www.cratejoy.com.

male-teen.information: The subscription box service is for anyone who loves hats and caps.  A monthly subscription is $9.99 a month.  An annual subscription is $9.49 a month, totaling $113.88, once a year.  For more information, go to www.cratejoy.com.

male-adult.name: Dark Horse Tackle
male-adult.information: Dark Horse Tackle Box is a premium bass fishing subscription built around small batch and custom lures.  A Dabble Pack Box is $7 a month.  A Weekend Warrior Box is $25 a month.  For more information, go to www.darkhorsetackle.com.

female-baby.name: Little Wonders Company
female-baby.information: Our monthly subscription box that caters to forging a pathway for girls of all ages and ethnic backgrounds to be whomever you desire and to be the best at it.  A monthly subscription is $8.97 a month.  For more information, go to www.littlewondersandco.com

female-child.name: Gymnastics Squared
female-child.information: Let us take the guesswork out of waht should be a memorable gymnastics experience.  Our gymnastics professionals know there are may options to buy stuff these days.  There are plenty of fads and tendy merchandise on the market, we'll do the work for you to ensure you receive a great value.  A gold box is $16.67 a month.  A platinum box is $30 a month. female-teen.information: The Fit Boxx is delivered to yor door each month loaded with premium fitness apparel, gear, accessories, nutrition, and more!  A monthly subscription is $48 a month.  For more information, go to www.fitboxx.com.

female-adult.name: The Happy Glamper
female-adult.information: Becoming One with Nature shold have to involve suffering.  We feature a different regional theme each month, with products from locla artisans and luxuary glamping gadgets! A monthly subscription is $49 a month.  A three-month pre-paid subscription is $46.33 a month, totaling $138.99, four times a year.  A six-month pre-paid subscription is $44.83 a month, totaling $268.98, twice a year.  An annual subscription is $39.92 a month, totaling $479.04, once a year.  For more information, go to www.thehappyglamper.com.

neutral-baby.name: Rent-a-Romper
neutral-baby.information: Rent-a-Romper curates custom capsule wardrobes that you can use as long as you want (or as long as the fit).  When you are ready, send the back, and get the next size up!  With two capsule sizes - Just the Essentials with 7 items and the Complete Capsule with 15, you'll always find the right fit.  The Just the Essentials subscription is $24 a month.  The Complete Capsule subscription is $39 a month.  For more information, go to www.rentaromper.com.

neutral-child.name: Junior Golf Life Box
neutral-child.information: Each box is designed to teach kids the fundamentals of golf, how to have fun on the fairway, feel confident on the course, and improve their life, health, and golf game by developing character, positive life values, leadership, and gold skills.  A monthly subscription is $39.95 a month.  A three-month pre-paid subscription is $38.32 a month, totaling $114.96, four times a year.  For more information, go to www.jrgolfbox.com.

neutral-teen.name: RunLocker
neutral-teen.information: Debunk the myths, advance your knowledge, and improve your running form.  Each Locker includes athletic wear, healthy snacks, recover aids and fitness accessories.  A monthly subscription is $44.95 a month.  A three-month pre-paid subscription is $43.95 a month, totaling $131.85, four times a year.  A six-month subscription is $41.95 a month, totaling $251.70, twice a year.  For more information, go to www.runlocker.com.

neutral-adult.name: Hiker Crate
neutral-adult.information: Hiker Crate is a health and fitness subscription box that specializes in outdoor adventure.  Each monthly box is filled with high-quality and useful hiking gear, tools, and snacks to help fuel your treks.  A monthly subscription is $35 a month.  A three-month pre-paid subscription is $34 a month, totaling $102, four times a year.  A six-month pre-paid subscription is $32.33 a month, totaling $193.98, twice a year.  An annual subscription is $30 a month, totaling $360, once a year.  For more information, go to www.gethikecrate.com.
